title: Does MediaPad 10 FHD support SIM card hot swapping? Why does it restart after I install or remove a SIM card?
answer: SIM card insertion or removal takes effect only after MediaPad 10 FHD restarts. MediaPad 10 FHD can detect the insertion and removal of a SIM card without damage to the card. However, to avoid damaging the port physically, do not frequently insert and remove the SIM card.
